INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: We have a highly qualified team, ready to design and develop strategic websites that drive your business growth. Our approach combines technology, creativity, and functionality to deliver tailored solutions that generate results.

POLICIES.TITLE: Cookie Policy
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Cookie Policy is an integral part of the Legal Notice and Privacy Policy of the website www.tspnegocios.com (hereinafter referred to as 'the Website'), which is owned by TSP Negocios. (hereinafter referred to as 'TSP Negocios') with its registered office at avenue Carlos Alberto Izaguirre Nro. 216 Independencia Lima. TSP Negocios is responsible for the cookies and the processing of personal data obtained through both its own and third-party cookies used on this Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_2: The Website uses third-party analytical cookies, specifically Google Analytics, to analyze user activity and compile statistics for the purpose of improving the Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: You can accept all cookies, reject them, or configure your preferences in the cookie settings panel. At any time, you can revoke your consent or change your cookie preferences by accessing the settings panel again. Additionally, you can prevent the download of cookies or delete those that have been installed by adjusting the settings in your browser, thus preventing the storage of cookies on your device. It is very important that you read and understand this cookie policy.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_4: We inform you of the possibility that rejecting or disabling cookies may affect or limit your browsing experience or the services provided on this Website.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What Are Cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are small alphanumeric identifiers containing information that is installed on the user's device. They are downloaded to the user's web browser when a website is visited and serve primarily to recognize the user's device upon each subsequent visit to the Website. The main purpose of cookies is to improve website quality and offer better usage.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: Cookies are small text files that are stored on the computer's hard drive and help to identify the user when they reconnect to the website. Their aim is to record the user's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and helps the website function more efficiently, providing greater personalization and analyzing user behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: Types of Cookies
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1. According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies are installed on the user's terminal from the domain managed by the website owner, while third-party cookies are installed from a domain managed by entities other than the website owner.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2. Depending on the duration of their activation:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies collect and store data while the user accesses a website and are deleted once the session ends. Persistent cookies remain on the user's terminal for a predefined period by the cookie manager or until they are deleted by the user.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: These cookies allow the user to navigate a website and use its various options or services. They are necessary for the operation of the site and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: These cookies remember user preferences for tools found on the website, so you don't have to reconfigure the service each time you visit. Examples include volume settings for video or sound players and video transmission speeds compatible with your browser. Users may disable these cookies, but this may impact the proper functioning of the website's services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: These cookies allow the monitoring and analysis of user behavior on the website to collect statistical data and improve the site's functionality. Such cookies are generated by an external provider every time a user visits a website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: These cookies collect information about the display duration or frequency of advertising positions, interaction with them, or user browsing patterns and behavior. They help to form an advertising interest profile and allow the delivery of advertisements tailored to the user's interests.

BLOCK.TITLE: Reject, Configure, Disable, or Block Cookies:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: Through the initial banner or cookie settings panel, which is always active and accessible, users have the option to accept or reject cookies and configure their preferences for cookies that require their consent.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may revoke their initial consent or modify their preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings panel.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_3: Moreover, users can block or delete cookies installed on their computer by configuring their browser options.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_4: Different browsers can be set to notify users of the receipt of cookies and, if desired, prevent their installation. Users can also check which cookies are installed and their expiration period, and delete them if necessary. Information on how to do this in relation to the most common browsers can be found at the following links:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_6: For more information on managing cookies in Internet Explorer:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_7: For more information on managing cookies in Mozilla Firefox:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_8: For more information on managing cookies in Safari:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_9: For more information on managing cookies in Opera:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_10: To stop being tracked by Google Analytics, visit:

MORE_INFO.TITLE: To Learn More About Cookies
MORE_INFO.DESCRIPTION_1: You can learn more about online behavioral advertising and online privacy at the following link:

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third Parties and International Transfers
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: You can find information about the processing carried out by third parties and any potential data transfers to other countries by these third parties in the links provided in this cookie policy. Any applicable mechanisms for the regularization of international transfers, if they exist, will be detailed by these third parties.

UPDATES.TITLE: Updates and Changes to the Cookie Policy
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: TSP Negocios may modify this Cookie Policy based on legislative or regulatory requirements, or to adapt this policy to the instructions issued by the National Authority for Data Protection of Peru and the European Data Protection Board. Therefore, Users are advised to visit it periodically.

DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: In accordance with the applicable legislation on data protection, TSP-Negocios respects Users' privacy and the confidentiality and security of personal data, adopting the necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent the loss, misuse, alteration, unauthorized access, and theft of personal data provided, considering the state of technology, the nature of the data, and the risks to which they are exposed.

POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_1: We are pleased that you visit the official website of TSP Negocios www.tspnegocios.com (hereinafter, Website) and appreciate your interest.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_2: TSP-Negocios S.A.C (hereinafter, TSP Negocios) is firmly committed to complying with current legislation on personal data protection to ensure the privacy, secrecy, and security of Users' personal data by applying appropriate technical and organizational measures for this purpose.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_3: This Privacy Policy aims to inform Users about the processing that TSP Negocios performs on the personal data provided by the User when accessing, browsing, and using the services offered on the Website, as well as the security measures adopted, the exercise of Users' rights, and the means of contact.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_4: Personal data will only be obtained by TSP Negocios for processing when they are adequate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the scope and purposes determined, explicit, and legitimate for which they have been obtained.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_5: Below, in compliance with current legislation on personal data protection, we provide Users with the following information:

RESPONSIBLE.TITLE: Data Controller
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_1: TSP-Negocios S.A.C (hereinafter, TSP Negocios), a closed corporation with RUC 20611473681, with its registered office at Carlos Alberto Izaguirre Avenue, 4, No. 216 Independencia, Lima (Peru), registered with the National Superintendency of Public Registries of the Government of Peru, with email [ventas@tspnegocios.pe], is the owner of the website www.tspnegocios.com (hereinafter, Website).
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_2: Users can contact the Data Controller through the following email address: soportetsp22@gmail.com

DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Definitions
DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: For the purposes of this Policy, the following terms shall have the meanings indicated below:
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_1: “Personal Data”: any information about an identified or identifiable natural person. An identifiable natural person is one whose identity can be determined, directly or indirectly, through an identifier.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_2: “Data Controller”: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other body that, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of data processing.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_3: “Data Processor”: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other body that processes personal data on behalf of the data controller.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_4: “Data Subject-User”: Any identified or identifiable natural person whose personal data is subject to processing.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_5: “Data Processing”: Any operation or set of operations performed on Personal Data or sets of personal data, whether by automated means or not, such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction.

PURPOSE.TITLE: Purpose of Processing
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_1: To manage information requests received through the 'Contact' function on the Website. To manage the data entered by Website Users. To fulfill this purpose. When the User clicks 'Send Message,' they will be indicating that they have read and accept the Privacy Policy of www.tspnegocios.com.

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Category of Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: The category of data processed by TSP Negocios on the Website includes:
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Email for Contact purposes. Identifying data: User identification. TSP Negocios uses this data solely to contact the User.

LEGITIMACY.TITLE: Legal Basis
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_1: The legal basis for managing communications received through the 'Contact' function is the legitimate interest of TSP Negocios.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_2: The legal basis for processing the personal data of Users who enter their data in the Contact form is the express consent granted when contacting TSP Negocios with legitimate interest.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_3: The User may revoke consent at any time. However, the processing of personal data carried out prior to the revocation of consent will remain lawful.

PRESERVATION.TITLE: Data Retention
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_1: Data will be retained for the strictly necessary period to fulfill the purpose for which they were collected. However, TSP Negocios may retain the data to make them available to competent authorities or to address potential claims, in which case the data will be kept blocked until the expiration of the limitation periods, at which point they will be deleted with appropriate security measures.
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_2: Once the retention period has ended, personal data may be anonymized for statistical purposes by TSP Negocios.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Data Communication
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_1: TSP Negocios will not transfer the data provided by Website Users to third parties, except with prior and express consent from them or if required by law (Public Administrations, Law Enforcement, Public Prosecutor's Office, Spanish Data Protection Agency, etc.).

USER_RIGHTS.TITLE: User Rights
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_1: TSP Negocios informs Users that regarding the processing of their personal data, they may exercise the following rights:
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_1: Right to revoke the consent granted at any time.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_2: Right to obtain information about whether TSP Negocios processes the User's personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_3: Right of access, rectification, portability, and deletion of their data, and to limit or oppose processing.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_4: Right not to be subject to automated individual decisions, including profiling.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_5: Right to file a complaint with the National Authority for Personal Data Protection when the User considers that TSP Negocios has violated their rights in the processing of personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may exercise their rights at any time and free of charge by writing to TSP Negocios S.A.C. by postal mail to the address Carlos Alberto Izaguirre Avenue, 4, No. 216 Independencia, Lima (Peru) or by email to [……soportetsp22@gmail.com…….], in both cases accompanied by a copy of the National Identity Document or equivalent document proving their identity.

SOCIALS.TITLE: Social Networks
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website may contain links that allow access to different social networks owned and managed by third parties (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, YouTube). These links on the Website are solely intended to facilitate Users' access to social networks to inform them about events organized by TSP Negocios.
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: The activation and use of these applications may involve the identification and authentication of the User (login/password) on the corresponding platforms, completely external to the Website and beyond the control of TSP Negocios. These social networks and platforms have their own privacy policies and cookie processing policies. In this regard, all information and personal data that the User provides to these platforms will be under their sole and exclusive responsibility.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website does not use cookies to collect information from Users; only its own session cookies are used for technical purposes - those that allow the User to navigate securely through the Website and use the various functions and services offered on the Website. For more detailed information, access the Cookie Policy.
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_2: However, this Website may contain links to third-party websites with privacy and cookie policies outside of TSP Negocios, which the User may decide to accept or reject when accessing those websites.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: Privacy Policy Modifications
MODIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: TSP Negocios reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy based on legislative, regulatory requirements, or to adapt this policy to the instructions issued by the National Authority for Personal Data Protection (ANPD, Peru) and/or the European Data Protection Board. Therefore, Users are advised to visit it periodically. When significant changes occur in this Policy, they will be published on the Website.
